alert.note: Alert for North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 9:08PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wasco County through 945 PM PDT... At 907 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Warm Springs Reservation, or 21 miles north of Madras, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wapinitia, South Junction and northeastern Warm Springs Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
